query: SELECT tipoServico, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT categoria SEPARATOR ', ') as categorias FROM instituicoes GROUP BY tipoServico
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user TocTSbjr2e5vBbe.81a251891814 --database QrgB7CmSLRUFiNpMh46Kpu --execute SELECT tipoServico, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT categoria SEPARATOR ', ') as categorias FROM instituicoes GROUP BY tipoServico
stdout:
tipoServico	total	categorias
servicos_saude	8	clinica, hospital, laboratorio
outros_servicos	1	farmacia
